name: pnp-list-formatting-multi-person-currentuser-rowclass
title: Current User's Rows (Using a Multi-Person Column)
shortDescription: Highlights the entire row for any list items where one of the assigned to users is the current user (the user viewing the list view, not the author of the format). You can easily adjust this to use a different person column by changing the `[$AssignedTo]` portion of the expression.
longDescription: Highlights the entire row for any list items where one of the assigned to users is the current user (the user viewing the list view, not the author of the format). You can easily adjust this to use a different person column by changing the `[$AssignedTo]` portion of the expression.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
